response.overview: Stephen McCauley welcomes musicians and producers from the worlds of trad, rock, beats and folk as they come together to create new, unique and collaborative performances. They reimagine and revise their own tracks, or others, in a special programme celebrating the art of collaboration.  And So I Watch You From Afar are joined by Ríoghnach Connolly, Declan O’Rourke teams up with hip-hop producer CBAKL, The Gloaming’s Iarla Ó Lionáird joins forces with Úna Monaghan and West Ocean String Quartet, and Saint Sister and Lisa Hannigan share a stage together once more.
response.tagline: Stephen McCauley welcomes musicians and producers from the worlds of trad, rock, beats and folk as they come together to create new and unique performances.
response.title: Collaborations… with Stephen McCauley
